Name: Royal Revolt II
About the game: Royal Revolt 2 is an action-packed strategy game. Build your defensive path and raid other players bases. Collect and upgrade items, such as weapons and armour to strengthen and customise your King. Lead your army into battle and protect your throne from opposing players from around the world. Advance your kingdom, perfect your defences and forge powerful alliances. • Take control of your king and lead your army in battle • Defend your castle by creating a deadly path for your enemies • Build your kingdom and improve your army to become more powerful • Participate in regular events such as 'Alliance Wars' where you work together as a team • Collaborate and discuss with friends by forging an alliance
Meta Title: Royal Revolt II: May 19, 2021, Flaregames and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Royal Revolt II? Check out the release date (May 19, 2021), developer insights from Flaregames, and a complete game summary.
